message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more, let's see what you do!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!
You're not giving me enough, I'll take the rest!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal!
You're not giving me enough, I'm starting to get impatient!
You're really pushing your luck, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal... yet!
I'm not going to let you have all the fun, Alice! Time to take what's mine!
You're really getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal... at all!
This is my last chance, Alice. Take it or leave it!
You're really running out of options, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to go easy on you!
It's now or never, Alice. Take the rest or leave it all!
